Assumptions: We assume that all non-single occupancy trips are carpools with the number of persons as defined on Advanced Controls, and that, of the total urban passenger mobility, 40% is provided by private car or taxi.

SOURCE ID: Author/Org, Date, Info: US Department of Energy (DOE) FOTW #1040, July 30, 2018: Average Vehicle Occupancy Remains Unchanged From 2009 to 2017
Assumptions: Car occupancy in this region (USA) assumed to apply to entire world

SOURCE ID: Author/Org, Date, Info: Fiorello, D., Martino, A., Zani, L., Christidis, P., & Navajas-Cawood, E. (2016). Mobility data across the EU 28 member states: results from an extensive CAWI survey. Transportation research procedia, 14, 1104-1113.
Assumptions: Car occupancy in this region (EU28) assumed to apply to entire world
